column5: hey guys ice fishing is coming up soon and me and my family are planning on doing a lot of ice fishing for lakers this year. we always go up to a lodge for walleye for a couple days but now we want to find one that is good for ice fishing lake trout. they dont have to be big, we are just looking to get some decent numbers. it has to be a drive to place and a drive about 7 hours away from toronto. are there any lodges you guys have stayed in the past that have met what i am looking for?   thanks!
Anyplace on Temagami Its my favourite icefishing destination for lakers.

Sunny Hill resort in Barry's Bay. Usually good for numbers early in the ice season where they put their shacks. As the water in Bark lake is drawn down considerably by hydro' later in Feb and into March, the fish seem to move off though.
x2 for Temagami...lots of great options to drive to...chance for a trophy...one of the most beautiful places on Earth
Also recommend Temagami BUT its a huge lake and lots of areas... find the honey holes and your good
Speaking of Temagami, when does it usually freeze up?  And yes I'm aware that lakers aren't open until Feb 15th.
